channel.title: Ask-Engines - Reboot
channel.description: Many people are familiar with Ask-Engines it was a Smart AI started awhile back and was featured on the Mopar-Monthly, Well I would like to thank the developer for giving me rights to take it over! So this will be the development thread. [center][url=http://www.trugul.com]www.trugul.com[/url] [/center] [center][size=14pt][b]Screenshots:[/b][/size][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/6ICcRFF.png?1[/img][/center]

item.title: Ask-Engines - Reboot
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

looked at the site. couldnt get past the horrid grammar im greeted with. took longer than it should have to find the text box.

and definitely dont like the fact that the whole page is reloaded just because a question is asked.

please look into something like ajax or javascript updating for the answers etc.

Read full topic
